RecentEvents.heading: ICCMW Monthly Dars
text: Dinner will be served after isha Salah.
All Community members are invited with families.
If you want to sponsor future Dars please contact.

RecentEvents.heading: ICCMW Quran Maktab for Kids
text: Mon - Thur (6 pm to 7 pm) Quran Maktab for kids ages 5 to 15 by Sh. Favzul Kabeer.

RecentEvents.heading: Weekly Youth Sister's Halaka in English
text: Led by Sr. Maysa Ockeh every Friday at 5:30 PM,
